title: Mr
incident_summary: On June 15, 2025, at approximately 2:30 PM, Plaintiff John Michael Johnson was lawfully operating his vehicle when he was struck by a vehicle operated by James Robert Smith at the intersection of Main Street and Fifth Avenue. The defendant failed to obey a red traffic signal, causing a violent collision. As a result of this incident, Plaintiff sustained serious bodily injuries requiring immediate emergency medical treatment.

medical_records.summary: On June 15, 2025 Emergency Room Visit: Plaintiff presented to the emergency department with severe pain and visible trauma. Diagnostic imaging revealed a comminuted fracture of the left femur. Emergency orthopedic surgery was performed the same day.
